Html: I've created my own bibliography style. I know that I can find my added page information by this xml path /b:Citation/b:Pages. But when I want to disable author, year or title I don't know the path. Can anybody help me?

In case one or more of the flags is set, empty elements are added to the list.

suppress author: /b:Citation/b:NoAuthor
suppressÂ title: /b:Citation/b:NoTitle
suppress year: /b:Citation/b:NoYear

Yves
